title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it is not possible to do so on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select an item in the library outline view.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected at the first time. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: On the first attempt, it should be possible to select any item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus automatically jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: On the first attempt, it should be possible to select any item in the library outline view without the focus jumping to the library file node.
